import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { IoIosStar } from "react-icons/io"; export const SingleProduct = () => { const [data, setData] = useState({ products: [] }); console.log(data); const getData = async (url) => { const response = await fetch(url); const newData = await response.json(); setData(data => ({ ...newData, products: [...data.products, ...newData.products] })); console.log(data); }; useEffect(() => { getData('./products.json') }, []); const addToCart = (name, price, id) => { if(!isNaN(price)) { const isAvailable = cart.find((item) => id === item.id ) } } return(
{data.products.map(( { id, name, image, desc, price }) => (

{name}

{desc}

${price}

))}
) } {/*
